resources.string: Welcome to the League Of Legends 2017 Tournament! This year we will be having over 30+ teams playing at out biggest event yet in the UK!
Here in this app you\'ll be able to find all the big teams that are playing, when they are due to play and as well location and booking any last minute tickets!
The 2016 League of Legends World Championship, more commonly called Worlds, is an international esports event takes place over five weeks of competitive play with 16 top teams.
Hereâ€™s the breakdown of the regions with teams competing at Worlds 2016 and how many spots each region gets:
\u2022 North America - NA League Championship Series (NA LCS) - 3 seeds
\u2022 Europe - EU League Championship Series (EU LCS) - 3 seeds
